log_text: Process winword.exe spawned on HOST-01 as user jdoe with normal behavior.
Word launched powershell.exe with unusual arguments after document open.
powershell.exe made outbound connection to rare external IP not seen before.
chrome.exe spawned from normal user session.
Backup agent modified multiple files as part of scheduled job.
Unusual process began encrypting user documents in quick succession on HOST-04.
EDR terminated encryption process after detecting ransomware-like behavior.
Admin account launched cmd.exe as SYSTEM shortly after logging in.
Powershell script executed to enumerate network shares and local admins.
